name: Galactic Gas Station
description:
This game was made in under 48 hours for part of a collaboration with a few other game dev YouTubers. Video here: 

----------------------------------

Controls:

WASD - Move

E - Grab available fuel hose

Take a fuel hose and attach it to incoming ships.

I sorta ran out of time before I could make a concrete game loop, so it's more like an infinite simulator 😅
